content:
BaseDevModeType Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of default DEVMODE structure to use as the base DEVMODE for conversions of managed PrintTicket objects to unmanaged DEVMODE structures.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)]
public enum BaseDevModeType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
BaseDevModeType

Remarks

Use a value of this enumeration primarily as a parameter in the ConvertPrintTicketToDevMode method.

Fields

PrinterDefault

The printer's default DEVMODE structure.
UserDefault

The user's default DEVMODE structure.
